articles.title: Amanpour: I've covered repressive regimes but I've never seen this - CNN Video
articles.description: CNN Chief International Anchor Christiane Amanpour tells CNN's Jim Sciutto and Clarissa Ward about the reaction from world leaders to the US Supreme Court's decision to overturn Roe v. Wade.

articles.author: Jeff Zeleny, Chief National Affairs Correspondent
articles.title: As abortion fight returns to states, Michigan is on the front line -- in courtrooms and campaigns
articles.description: Democratic Gov. Gretchen Whitmer is on the front lines of protecting abortion rights in Michigan, where a court injunction is the only thing keeping the state from reverting to a 1931 law that banned and criminalized abortion.

articles.title: Analysis: The force of Supreme Court's right turn has shaken the country
articles.description: The Supreme Court reached into every corner of American life, reordering intimate family choices, breaching the separation of church and state, and diminishing the steps government can take to prevent gun violence or protect the environment.

articles.author: Hannah Sarisohn
articles.title: Washington state police will not comply with out-of-state agency requests for abortion-related information, governor says
articles.description: Washington state Gov. Jay Inslee issued a directive Thursday that bars state police from cooperating with out-of-state investigatory requests related to abortion in his efforts to make the state a "sanctuary" for those seeking the services.

articles.author: Analysis by Stephen Collinson, CNN
articles.title: Analysis: The Supreme Court's conservative majority is a threat to the world
articles.description: The Supreme Court spent recent weeks triggering political and legal earthquakes across America. But its latest audacious blow could affect the entire planet.

articles.author: Opinion by John D. Sutter
articles.title: Opinion: Supreme Court deals a massive blow to the planet
articles.description: The Supreme Court limiting the EPA's power to push toward carbon neutrality is the 36.4 billionth reminder that this is an all-hands-on-deck moment for climate action, writes John Sutter.

articles.author: Sandee LaMotte, CNN
articles.title: Gene discovery may explain why more women get Alzheimer's disease
articles.description: Scientists have uncovered a new genetic link for Alzheimer's disease in women, and this gene discovery may explain why more women get the disease.

articles.author: Casey Tolan, CNN
articles.title: Some district attorneys in red states have vowed not to prosecute abortion cases
articles.description: As abortion bans go into effect in states across the US, how strongly the laws are enforced will depend on local prosecutors -- and some are promising not to bring abortion providers to court.
